name: GWJ#46: Jumping Orb
description:
Instructions:

- Get the pink floating orb in each level to move to the next one

- In this game you can not jump, but  you can move horizontally

- At start of each level there's a pre-play stage, where you can

   + Move the camera around freely to view the whole stage

   + Place bubbles that makes you jump whenever you touch them (or dissapear after hit by 3 bullets)

   + Press space to start playing/moving in the level

   + After exiting the pre-play stage, you can not palce bubbles anymore

Keybinds:

W&D to move

R to retry level

If the game freezes by clicking ~ on html5, refresh page
